product_name: Royal Robbins Essential Rollover Skirt - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for travel, the Essential Rollover Skirt from Royal Robbins resists wrinkles, features a comfortable rollover waistband, and has a hidden pocket. Can you find it?. Cotton/polyester skirt has spandex for stretch and shape retention, wicks moisture and dries fast. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Wide waistband pulls on easily and accommodates those hearty meals. Essential Rollover Skirt from Royal Robbins has a small hidden-zip pocket at side of front waistband. Closeout.
